<p>Subaru plans to introduce its first-ever production hybrid vehicle for the U.S. market at the 2013 New York International Auto Show. The automaker said the new vehicle is called the Subaru XV Crosstrek Hybrid and is based on the XV Crosstrek crossover introduced for 2013.</p><div class="banner-im">

            var content = $("#NewsStory").text().replace(/"/g, "'");
        
        $.ajax({
            url: "/_Ajax/Encyclopedia.asmx/GetRelevantOrRandomWord",
            type: "POST",
            data: '{"content":"' + content + '"}',
            beforeSend: function () {
                $("#EncyclopediaControlLoading").show();
            },
            success: function (word) {
                $("#EncyclopediaControlLoading").hide();
                $("#EncyclopediaControl .EncTitle").attr("href", word.url).html(word.title);
                if(word.thumbnail != ""){
                    $("#EncyclopediaControl .EncThumbImg").attr("src", word.thumbnail).attr("alt", word.title);
                    $("#EncyclopediaControl .EncThumbUrl").attr("href", word.url).show();
                }
                $("#EncyclopediaControl .EncTeaser").html(word.description);
                $("#EncyclopediaControl .EncReadMore").attr("href", word.url);
                $("#EncyclopediaControlContent").show();
            },
            error: function (xhr, status, error) {
                $("#EncyclopediaControlLoading").hide();
            }
        });
    });
</script>
